form.p: DriverLib provides low-level peripheral control functions that enable simple and efficient control of peripherals found on the MSP430. The drivers are provided in source form to allow maximum reuse in a variety of development environments.

form.li: See the DriverLib User Guide for your device family.
Additional information on how to use DriverLib can be found here
In-depth peripheral specific information is available in the MSP430 MSP430FR58xx and MSP430FR59xx Family User's Guide or MSP430x5xx and MSP430x6xx Family User's Guide
Please post your questions and feedback to the MSP430 E2E Forum
